Body: We have been doing phonemic rules in class, and our professor says to write a "phonemic rewrite" of words based on these rules, where these words are written like so "/_/". While I understand the concept of phonemes and their representation in the slashes, I dont understand it when words are represented in those slashes or what a phonemic rewrite is. Can someone please elaborate on this? Unfortunately, my textbook does not cover it.
Title: What does a phonemic rewrite mean?
